remark.ch: 舊制大一英文，限重修生、需修舊制大一英文之轉學生及僑生。

goal.en: READING 8. I can scan quickly through long and complex texts and find the details I want. 9. I can search and browse various sources to obtain relevant information. 10. I can understand the main ideas of reading materials within my field of study or of my interest. 11. I can understand the writer’s point of view when reading an article. WRITING 12. I can write an essay with reasonably accurate spelling and punctuation. 13. I can write an essay with clear descriptions and proper details. 14. I can write an essay combining the ideas from multiple sources. 15. I can write an essay giving reasons to support my point of view.
goal.ch: READING 閱讀 8.能快速瀏覽長篇複雜文本並掌握所需的細節。 9.能搜尋和瀏覽多個資料出處以獲取相關資訊。 10.能理解個人專業領域或感興趣主題的文本大意。 11.能了解文章作者的觀點。 WRITING寫作 12.能寫出拼字和標點符號用法正確的文章。 13.能寫出描述清楚、提供細節的文章。 14.能寫出結合多個來源想法的文章。 15.能寫出清楚的理由來支持自己的論點。

grading.en: Study group/Presentations 30％ Performance (quizzes, participation, attendance, etc.) 25％ Midterm assessment 20％ Final Exam 20％ Self-learning 5％
grading.ch: 自學小組 30％ 平常成績 （小考、課堂參與、出缺席等）25％ 期中評量 20％ 期末評量 20％ 英語自學 5％
